tool_description: This API returns any claims filed against collateral that is pledged on a loan. It includes debtor name and address, related filings, collateral, legal type and legal document numbers.
title: UCC Search Report

api_list.name: /GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ucc-search-report.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ucc-search-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ucc-search-report.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ucc-search-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
